solvents.name: aqueous solution of RbOH and g-CD

synthesis.modifications: slight modifications to the reported procedure
synthesis.storage: stored in a glove box prior to use

synthesis.precautions: using freshly distilled Py and anhydrous solvents to prevent partial oxidation

synthesis.notes: Reaction at room temperature caused significant morphological damage. After 24 hours, chemical oxidation was evidenced by the black color of the crystals.
synthesis.washing: washed off several times with aliquots of fresh solvent
